#text=I recently got a flat bicycle tire while riding home from work .
#text=As soon as I got home , I removed the tire from the bike and checked for the cause .
#text=Sure enough , there was a small puncture , I must have run over something sharp while commuting home .
#text=I then went to the local bike shop and the man at the shop recommended that I buy a patch kit , since doing so is much cheaper than replacing the entire tube .
#text=The patch kit was very easy to use as the instructions were very details .
#text=First I added glue to the area and then put the patch on top .
#text=After holding the patch in place for a few minutes , I added a little talc .
#text=I also added a little talc to the inside of the tire .
#text=Once everything was set , I put the wheel back on the bike and everything was good as new .
